name: Newer Super Luigi Wii: Dark Moon
overview: Will you be able to collect alll of the Gold Moons that lay across the mysterious island? Play through 16 all-new levels, avoiding enemies and obstacles as you make your way to King Boo's Mansion! Four new tilesets also await you, as well as 2 backgrounds. Even the world map has its own new look! Several cool new tracks, composed by White Toad himself, are present in the game to give it a distinct feel from other hacks. Some Nintendo themes also make appearances. You can download the soundtrack below.
